posts.title: Amazon Echo Show Gen 2
posts.content: Make your day-to-day life run smoother than ever with this second generation Amazon Echo Show. This indispensable Alexa-enabled device will assist you in everything from choosing the perfect song to making calls, automating your home, and much much more!

posts.title: Heated Thermo-Ring Ice Cream Scoop
posts.content: Serve the perfect scoop every time no matter how frozen your ice cream is by using this heated thermo-ring scoop. Biodegradable liquid transfers heat from the handle to the edges so you can easily carve into the carton without having to strain your dainty wrist.

posts.title: Darth Vader Color Changing Table Lamp
posts.content: Give the dark side of your room a little more light by turning on the Darth Vader color changing table lamp. This unique lamp can shine in one of seven vibrant colors and is made using an engrave machining process that creates stunning optical illusions.

posts.title: T-Rex Trophy Wall Sculpture
posts.content: Show off your elite hunting skills with this T-Rex trophy wall mountable sculpture. Not only will guests of your home think you are a deadly hunter, but they’ll also be impressed that you were invited to visit the exclusive Jurassic Park island – and then killed anything that moved.

posts.title: Donald Trump Chia Pet
posts.content: Get a laugh or two at the expense of The Donald by watching him grow a vibrant green afro using this Donald Trump Chia Pet. By following the simple instructions you’ll be able to give Donald’s terracotta colored bust a lively green toupee in just 2 weeks.

posts.title: Ice Straws
posts.content: Your drink is always just a little bit too warm for your tastes. You need a classy straw to take care of your drink and make it just a little more fabulous. The icy straw will solve your temperature issues by keeping your mai tai nice and freezy.

posts.title: Disposable Hair Clog Removal Tool
posts.content: Bypass costly plumbers by instantly unclogging your bathroom sink using this disposable hair clog removal tool. Simply insert the end of the device down your sink and then you spin the handle to fish out that nasty clump of wet hair.

posts.title: Illustrated National Parks Book
posts.content: Take a tour of America’s most scenic locations from the comfort of home by perusing the pages of this Illustrated National Parks book. This fascinating 160 page book offers a combination of history, facts and breathtaking photographs from many national parks.

posts.title: Giant Inflatable Bowling Pins
posts.content: Bowl a perfect game of 300 from the comfort of your own backyard with the giant inflatable bowling pins! These ginormous pins each stand at 29″ tall and provide kids and adults with an exhilarating game of bowling the likes of which have never been experienced before.

posts.title: Standing Room Camping Tent
posts.content: Make your campsite a little more habitable by replacing your traditional tent with this standing room tent. When fully erect, the tent stands at six and a half feet so that you can move around and change comfortably without hurting your back.

posts.title: Herb Stripper
posts.content: Simplify the tedious chore of de-leafing herbs by making it a quick and easy task using the herb stripper. With a single pull of the stem through one of the specially designed holes, the herbs will fall neatly into a small receptacle so you can use them as needed.

posts.title: The Man Who Made Things Out Of Trees
posts.content: The Man Who Made Things Out Of Trees is the fascinating read that tells the story of how one individual cut down a single tree to see how many things could be crafted from it. It features vivid storytelling in addition to 8 pages of lively illustrations.
